title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 107.3 - Dealer registration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 107.3 - Dealer registration

State Regulations

Any person who is a dealer shall register as a dealer. The
commissioner upon receipt of an application and the fee required under article
47 of the Vehicle and Traffic Law shall issue a distinctive registration number
to the registrant and issue a dealer registration
certificate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
107.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
